entry.title: Hello Elder
entry.content: 当时我就念了两句诗： 苟利国家生死以岂因祸福避趋之 Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
